text: Helen Rowland, sometimes known as Baby Helen Rowland (born October 23, 1919) was an American child actress. She appeared in nine movies between 1922 and 1927. She was known for her role in Timothy's Quest. ==Selected filmography== * Timothy Quest (1922) * What's Wrong with the Women? (1922) * The Daring Years (1923) ==Other websites== * Category:1919 births Category:American child actors Category:American silent movie actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1978 deaths
title: Helen Rowland
